# has_item_merge_rules interface

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/itemization/has_item_merge_rules
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T01:03:13.713229

---

Item Merge Rules Interface. Implemented by components that want to participate in item mergeability checks.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Itemization }` |

## Members

This interface has functions, but no data members.

| Function Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
